basic.description:
A historical perspective on mathematical ideas focusing on a selection of important and accessible theorems. A project is required.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;12G;72P)
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Mathematics with a Historical Perspective

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     (MATH110 or MATH111) and (MATH121 or MATH126 or MATH120).
